zh.Detail.doc.613233-0: 小度智能家居开放平台：
zh.Detail.doc.613233-2: DuerOS支持在家居场景下进行云端控制，该页面主要将平台的产品与DuerOS支持语音控制的产品进行映射，达到小度平台控制本平台设备的目的。
zh.Detail.doc.613233-4: 1、在百度小度技能平台创建技能，并授权。
zh.Detail.doc.613233-5: 2、在物联网平台 系统管理--应用管理中配置应用完成与DuerOS的关联。
zh.Detail.doc.613233-10: 物联网平台的登录地址http://host:port/JetLinks.cn
zh.Detail.doc.613233-11: 请复制并填写物联网平台的appId
zh.Detail.doc.613233-12: 以空格分割的权限列表，若不传递此参数，代表请求用户的默认权限
zh.Detail.doc.613233-15: 请复制并填写物联网平台的secureKey
zh.Detail.doc.613233-18: 第三方应用唯一标识，物联网平台的自动生成
zh.Detail.doc.613233-19: secureKey 第三方应用唯一标识匹配的秘钥，物联网平台的自动生成
zh.Detail.doc.613233-21: 为应用用户分配角色，根据绑定的角色，进行系统菜单赋权
zh.Detail.doc.613233-23: 为应用用户分配所属组织，根据绑定的组织，进行数据隔离
zh.Detail.doc.613233-24: 请复制并填写小度平台的回调地址
zh.Detail.doc.613233-27: 3、登录物联网平台，进行平台内产品与DuerOS产品的数据映射。
zh.Detail.doc.613233-28: 4、智能家居用户通过物联网平台中的用户，登录小度APP，获取平台内当前用户的所属设备。获取后即可进行语音控制。
zh.Detail.doc.613233-30: “设备类型”为DuerOS平台拟定的标准规范，设备类型将决定【动作映射】中“动作”的下拉选项，以及【属性映射】中“Dueros属性”的下拉选项

en.Detail.doc.613233-2: DuerOS supports cloud control in home scenarios. This page mainly maps the platform's products with DuerOS's voice controlled products to achieve the goal of controlling the platform's devices on a small scale.
en.Detail.doc.613233-4: 1. Create skills on Baidu Xiaodu Skills Platform and authorize them.
en.Detail.doc.613233-5: 2. Configure the association between application completion and DuerOS in the IoT platform system management - application management.
en.Detail.doc.613233-10: Login address for IoT platform http://host:port/JetLinks.cn
en.Detail.doc.613233-11: Please copy and fill in the appId of the IoT platform
en.Detail.doc.613233-12: A permission list separated by spaces. If this parameter is not passed, it represents the default permission of the requesting user
en.Detail.doc.613233-14: Please copy and fill in: HTTPS://host: port/pai/v1/token
en.Detail.doc.613233-15: Please copy and fill in the secureKey of the IoT platform
en.Detail.doc.613233-18: Unique identifier for third-party applications, automatically generated by IoT platforms
en.Detail.doc.613233-19: The secureKey is a unique identifier for third-party applications that matches the secret key, automatically generated by the IoT platform
en.Detail.doc.613233-21: Assign roles to application users, and empower the system menu according to the bound roles
en.Detail.doc.613233-23: Assign organization to application users and isolate data based on the bound organization
en.Detail.doc.613233-24: Please copy and fill in the callback address of the Xiaodu platform
en.Detail.doc.613233-27: 3. Log in to the IoT platform and perform data mapping between platform products and DuerOS products.
en.Detail.doc.613233-28: 4. Smart home users can log in to the Xiaodu APP through users on the IoT platform to obtain the device belonging to the current user on the platform. Once obtained, voice control can be performed.
en.Detail.doc.613233-30: The 'Device Type' is a standard specification developed by the DuerOS platform, which determines the dropdown options for 'Actions' in the' Action Mapping 'and' Dueros Attributes' in the 'Attribute Mapping'
